title: Breath of the Wild VR Mode Announced - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.05.2019
description:
Andrea and Fran discuss Zelda and Mario going into VR and more!

00:05:59 - Housekeeping
Saturday, you’re on the clock, New York! 3 p.m. at e’s Bar Morningside Heights
The Roper Report   -
00:08:17 - Breath of the Wild is getting full VR support later this month
00:19:57 - Microsoft, Sony, and Nintendo under investigation for consumer rights violation
00:27:30 - Kaz Hirai Retiring From Sony In June
00:32:00 - Epic’s Comments on Epic Store Spyware
00:41:46 - Out today
00:46:26 -  23&Me
00:49:04 - Skillshare
Reader mail   -
00:54:16 - “What is something coming up that you're excited for?” - Billythedoor
00:50:50 - “When is it too late to join the hype train?” - Heather
00:56:52 - Squad Up: Dan from Houston - Podcasting - @Silverlobo21
00:57:36 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
MONDAY: Fran & Andrea
TUESDAY: Greg & Andrea
WEDNESDAY: Greg & Whitta
THURSDAY: Greg & Andrea
FRIDAY: Greg & Tim
